item.title: CVE-2018-17256|2024-09-17T04:08:55.751Z -- cybersecurity%20philippines%20-%20cert -- umbracocms
item.description: Persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Umbraco CMS 7.12.3 allows authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script via the Header Name of a content (Blog, Content Page, etc.). The vulnerability is exploited when updating or removing public access of a content.
